mapper.sql: COUPON_ID as couponId, COUPON_TYPE_ID as couponTypeId, NAME as name, ISVALID as isvalid, DISCOUNT_TYPE as discountType, UNIT as unit, UNIT_QUANTITY as unitQuantity, DISCOUNT as discount, REMARK as remark, FIXED_START_TIME as fixedStartTime, FIXED_END_TIME as fixedEndTime, DYNAMIC_AVALID_DAY as dynamicAvalidDay, CREATE_TIME as createTime, MODIFY_TIME as modifyTime, CONDITION_ENOUGH_MONEY as conditionEnoughMoney, CONDITION_ENOUGH_UNIT_QUANTITY as conditionEnoughUnitQuantity, INCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP as includeCommodityGroup, EXCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP as excludeCommodityGroup, IS_DELIVERY_FREE as isDeliveryFree, MODIFY_ADMIN_ID as modifyAdminId, FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_ID as fixedCreateSubjectId, FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_TYPE as fixedCreateSubjectType
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from coupon
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon (COUPON_TYPE_ID, NAME, ISVALID, DISCOUNT_TYPE, UNIT, UNIT_QUANTITY, DISCOUNT, REMARK, FIXED_START_TIME, FIXED_END_TIME, DYNAMIC_AVALID_DAY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CONDITION_ENOUGH_MONEY, CONDITION_ENOUGH_UNIT_QUANTITY, INCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP, EXCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP, IS_DELIVERY_FREE, MODIFY_ADMIN_ID, FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_ID, FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_TYPE) values (#{couponTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fixedEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dynamicAvalidDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{conditionEnoughMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conditionEnoughUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{includeCommodityGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{excludeCommodityGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeliveryFree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyAdminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedCreateSubjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fixedCreateSubjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

COUPON_TYPE_ID,
NAME,

mapper.update:
update coupon
COUPON_ID = #{record.couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COUPON_TYPE_ID = #{record.couponTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISVALID = #{record.isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNT_TYPE = #{record.discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_QUANTITY = #{record.unitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISCOUNT = #{record.discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIXED_START_TIME = #{record.fixedStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIXED_END_TIME = #{record.fixedEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DYNAMIC_AVALID_DAY = #{record.dynamicAvalidDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONDITION_ENOUGH_MONEY = #{record.conditionEnoughMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONDITION_ENOUGH_UNIT_QUANTITY = #{record.conditionEnoughUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP = #{record.includeCommodityGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP = #{record.excludeCommodityGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELIVERY_FREE = #{record.isDeliveryFree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_ADMIN_ID = #{record.modifyAdminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_ID = #{record.fixedCreateSubjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_TYPE = #{record.fixedCreateSubjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update coupon set COUPON_ID = #{record.couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COUPON_TYPE_ID = #{record.couponTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISVALID = #{record.isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_TYPE = #{record.discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_QUANTITY = #{record.unitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCOUNT = #{record.discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIXED_START_TIME = #{record.fixedStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIXED_END_TIME = #{record.fixedEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DYNAMIC_AVALID_DAY = #{record.dynamicAvalidDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONDITION_ENOUGH_MONEY = #{record.conditionEnoughMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONDITION_ENOUGH_UNIT_QUANTITY = #{record.conditionEnoughUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP = #{record.includeCommodityGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCLUDE_COMMODITY_GROUP = #{record.excludeCommodityGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELIVERY_FREE = #{record.isDeliveryFree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_ADMIN_ID = #{record.modifyAdminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_ID = #{record.fixedCreateSubjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FIXED_CREATE_SUBJECT_TYPE = #{record.fixedCreateSubjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

COUPON_TYPE_ID = #{couponTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
